---
id: start-cloud-transcode
title: "StartCloudTranscode"
description: "## Overview"
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/en/server/api-reference/stream-mixing/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>StartCloudTranscode</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


## Overview

This document describes how to use the server-side API to transcode a specified single input Stream into video Streams with different resolutions, bitrates, and frame rates.

For single-stream transcoding triggered by the "client" based on transcoding templates, please refer to [Single-Stream Transcoding](/real-time-video-android-java/live-streaming/single-stream-transcoding); for related "server" callbacks, please refer to [Single-Stream Transcoding Started Callback](/real-time-video-server/callback/transcoding/on-demand-transcoding-started) and [Single-Stream Transcoding Stopped Callback](/real-time-video-server/callback/transcoding/on-demand-transcoding-stopped).

## Prerequisites

Before implementing single-stream transcoding, ensure that:

- You have created a project in the [ZEGOCLOUD Console](https://console.zegocloud.com) and applied for a valid AppId and ServerSecret. For details, please refer to [Console - Project Information](/console/project-info).
- You have enabled the "Stream Mixing" service permission in the [ZEGOCLOUD Console](https://console.zego.im). For details, please refer to [Console - Service Configuration - Stream Mixing](/console/service-configuration/enable-stream-mixing-service), or contact ZEGOCLOUD technical support to enable it.

<Note title="Rate Limit">100 requests/second</Note>

<h4 id="template">Preset output templates for single-stream transcoding</h4>

The parameter configurations for preset templates (TemplateId values 0, 1, 2, 3) are as follows:

<table>

<tbody><tr>
<th>Template ID</th>
<th>Resolution (Short Edge)</th>
<th>Bitrate (kbps)</th>
<th>Other Configuration</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>0 (360P)</td>
<td>360</td>
<td>600</td>
<td rowspan="4"><ul><li>Frame rate: Maintained at the original input Stream frame rate.</li><li>GOP: Default is 2.</li><li>Video encoding format: Default is H.264.</li><li>Audio encoding format: Default is AAC-LC.</li><li>Preset templates output resolution adaptively based on the short edge, with the long edge scaled proportionally according to the short edge of the transcoding template.</li></ul></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>1 (540P)</td>
<td>540</td>
<td>1000</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2 (720P)</td>
<td>720</td>
<td>1500</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>3 (1080P)</td>
<td>1080</td>
<td>2000</td>
</tr>
</tbody></table>

***Only some parameters in this interface support dynamic updates after starting Stream Mixing. Parameters not marked do not support dynamic updates. For details, please refer to the parameter descriptions in the table below.***

Parameter modifications for the same task need to ensure the sequence number is incremented."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>TranscodeInput</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span><span className={"openapi-schema__divider"}></span><span className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>Input Stream settings for the transcoding task.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Transcoding input Stream ID, which comes from the RTC service. If both StreamId and StreamUrl are specified, StreamUrl takes effect.\n","example":"stream1"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrl"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"","description":"Transcoding input Stream URL, supports RTMP protocol.\n\n> **Note**\n>\n> Only one of StreamId or StreamUrl is required. If both StreamId and StreamUrl are specified, StreamUrl takes effect.\n"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>TranscodeOutput</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span><span className={"openapi-schema__divider"}></span><span className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>Output Stream information for the transcoding task.</div><li className={"opening-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}><span className={"opening-array-bracket_text"}>Array</span><span className={"opening-array-bracket_symbol"}>[</span></div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamId"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Output Stream ID.\n- By default, the transcoding task outputs to RTC or low-latency live streaming products.\n- You can also contact ZEGOCLOUD technical support to configure the transcoding Stream output to the ZEGOCLOUD-proxied CDN live streaming product, with the scope taking effect for the entire AppId. If a Stream is specified to output to the CDN live streaming product, StreamUrl must be set, and the default transcoding output to ZEGOCLOUD-proxied CDN cannot be configured.\n\n> **Note**\n>\n> Only one of StreamId or StreamUrl is required. If both StreamId and StreamUrl are specified, StreamUrl takes effect.\n","example":"stream3"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamUrl"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"","description":"Only supports RTMP protocol, indicating transcoding output to the CDN live streaming service. Audiences can pull the transcoded Stream from the CDN live streaming.\n\n> **Note**\n>\n> Only one of StreamId or StreamUrl is required. If both StreamId and StreamUrl are specified, StreamUrl takes effect.\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"TemplateId"} required={true} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `1`, `2`, `3`, `4`]"} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":[0,1,2,3,4],"description":"Single-stream transcoding output template ID. ZEGOCLOUD provides the following templates:\n- 0: Output 360P transcoded Stream\n- 1: Output 540P transcoded Stream\n- 2: Output 720P transcoded Stream\n- 3: Output 1080P transcoded Stream\n- 4: Custom template. When the general template does not meet your requirements, please use the custom template to set output parameters\n\nPlease click [Preset output templates for single-stream transcoding](#template) to view specific preset template configuration parameters.\n","example":4}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>TemplateConfig</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>Custom template configuration.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"VideoEncId"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `1`, `2`]"} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","enum":[0,1,2],"default":0,"description":"Video encoding format of the output Stream.\n\n- 0: Default value, indicating the output Stream encoding format is consistent with the input Stream encoding format.\n- 1: H264\n- 2: H265\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Fps"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","description":"Video frame rate, must be greater than or equal to 0.\n\n- 0: Default value, indicating the output Stream frame rate is consistent with the input Stream frame rate.\n- Other values: Output frame rate of the transcoded Stream. The maximum frame rate is limited to 20 fps by default. If you need to output a Stream with a higher frame rate, please contact ZEGOCLOUD technical support for configuration.\n\nCurrently, outputting transcoded Streams with different frame rates is not supported. The frame rate settings for all output Streams must be consistent.\n","example":15}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"GOP"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","default":2,"description":"Keyframe interval of the transcoded output Stream, must be greater than 0, default value is 2, unit: seconds.\n\nIf you need to customize it, please contact ZEGOCLOUD technical support to enable custom support.\n","example":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ShortEdgeAdaption"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","default":0,"description":"Whether the output Stream resolution uses the set Width as the short edge and adapts to landscape or portrait orientation.\n\n- 0: Default value, output directly according to the set Width and Height.\n- 1: Use the set Width as the short edge, and adapt to landscape or portrait orientation by scaling proportionally according to the input Stream resolution.\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Height"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","description":"Height, range is [0, 3000], the value must be a multiple of 2.\n\n- 0: Default value. When both this parameter and Width are 0, it indicates the output Stream resolution is consistent with the input Stream resolution.\n- Other values: The height of the transcoded Stream's custom resolution.\n\n**ðŸ”Supports real-time updates during transcoding. Call this interface again to dynamically update this parameter.**\n","example":720}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Width"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","description":"Width, range is [0, 3000], the value must be a multiple of 2.\n\n- 0: Default value. When both this parameter and Height are 0, it indicates the output Stream resolution is consistent with the input Stream resolution.\n- Other values: The width of the transcoded Stream's custom resolution.\n\n**ðŸ”Supports real-time updates during transcoding. Call this interface again to dynamically update this parameter.**\n","example":1280}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"VideoBitrate"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","default":0,"description":"Video bitrate, must be greater than or equal to 0, unit is bps.\n\n- 0: Default value, indicating the output bitrate is consistent with the input Stream bitrate.\n- Other values: Output bitrate of the transcoded Stream.\n\n**ðŸ”Supports real-time updates during transcoding. Call this interface again to dynamically update this parameter.**\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"LowBitrateHD"} required={false} schemaName={"int"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int","default":0,"description":"Whether to enable the \"HD Low Bitrate\" feature.\n\n- 0: Default value, not enabled.\n- 1: Enabled.\n\nCurrently, the \"HD Low Bitrate\" feature requires contacting ZEGOCLOUD technical support to enable permission, and it only takes effect when VideoEncId is set to 2 (H265).\n","example":0}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
